items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress
items.body: 18 y.o. daughter loved this. Cute and comfortable. A little too loose across shoulders so daughter had to keep fixing it but she still really liked it. Read more
items.author: TLC24

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEAUTIFUL ðŸ˜ EXCELLENT MATERIAL
items.body: OMG BEAUTIFUL FIT PERFECT Read more
items.author: JENNETTE â¤ï¸

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice party dress, but watch out for a couple of things
items.body: I need something fun for an upcoming Christmas party and thought this might fill the bill. If you're looking at this too, be aware that the photos make the dress appear to bell out from the waist. The model must have been wearing a short petticoat or something, because there's nothing in the structure of the dress that would help it do that. The other important thing to note is that the material is *very* stretchy. Depending on how you and the dress sizing line up, this might be a plus - or a minus. The fur trim is fine and workmanship is too. Hope this info helps you sizzle at your next party! Read more
items.author: Annelise Lecavalier

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice but not for me
items.body: It's a cute dress. But not my style when I put it on. I'm 5'8 167lbs and I got an XL. It is too big, so I should've gotten a Large. The fur collar is heavy and hangs or droops down. I'm assuming g if I got a smaller size that maybe it would hold it up and in place better. The fur is very soft and the dress is a nice material. The color is a nice deep wine collar. Make sure you purchase your size and it fits on the snug side to hold it up. Read more
items.author: Cherie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Holiday Dress !
items.body: Beautiful dress!!! Great for the holidays. I am 5'2 ' 132 lbs and I ordered a medium and fits perfect. Read more
items.author: Mary Sue Bowers

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress but runs big
items.body: This dress was way nicer than I thought it would be for that price. The material is thick and feels like it would hold up really well . It runs big on the top. Try to size on the bottom. For reference, Iâ€™m about 5â€™6 160 lbs. I ordered a large and it was falling off Read more
items.author: Pasta Lasagna

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous dress!
items.body: STUNNING DRESS!!! Fits perfectly and the quality is amazing!!! Cannot wait to wear it!! Read more
items.author: kim

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth it!
items.body: Such a gorgeous dress and great material. I had to fluff the faux fur a bit since it arrived in a vacuum sealed bag. Absolutely worth it! Read more
items.author: Maira

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Off Shoulder Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Off Shoulder Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Winered, White, Black, Black White. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
